text: Antonio De Torres Jurado (13 June 1817 â€“ 19 November 1892) was a Spanish guitarist and guitar maker. Torres Jurado is often respected among guitarists the same way Antonio Stradivari is respected among violinists. His work established the shape, design, and construction of the modern classical guitar. Category:Spanish musical entertainers Category:Spanish guitarists Category:1817 births Category:1892 deaths
title: Antonio Torres
